Class.ClassComment: CounterEventGenerator /** * A interface to generate {@link CounterEvent} from the current {@link CounterValue}. * @author Pedro Ruivo * @since 9.2 */

Method.MethodComment:
/** * It generates the {@link CounterEvent}.

The {@code value} is the new value of {@link CounterEvent}. * @param key The counter's key. * @param value The counter's most recent {@link CounterValue}. * @return The {@link CounterEvent} with the updated value. */
